import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import SearchForm from "../SearchForm" import Link from "next/link" import "./style.scss" const PopularPages = ({pages}) =>
    {pages.map((page, i)=>
  • {page.title}
    • )}
const FullWidthSearchPanel = ({popularPages}) =>
